basis: The user explicitly commits to trying today with a concrete plan (250 ml water, 1-minute box breathing, hunger rating, conditional bite or skipping bite) and asks for flexibility, indicating high likelihood of following the suggestion.
cognitive_dissonance: Moderate: user acknowledges anxiety about regular eating and desires flexibility, indicating internal tension between fear/aversion and the proposed routine.
negative_thought_patterns: Fear of biting, concern about eating regularly, potential all-or-nothing thinking about meals.
emotional_triggers: Anxiety around eating, discomfort with new breathing exercise, heat/comfort environment in Suwon.
coaching_notes: Keep reinforcing small, concrete steps and flexibility (skip bite when not hungry). Normalize anxiety and encourage reaching out to clinician/supportive person. Offer non-food calming alternatives and check in after the attempt to adjust future steps.
